title: Canon Powershot G10
text: I have no idea how those light tendrils come about in the lens, but they kind of creep me out. That glass is bizarre...

title: FujiFilm X-T20 + Fujinan CCTV GDS-35/1.7
text: Nice view, but i seem to of ruined it by getting the lens wet. I had to remove the macro adapters (ugh) while on the hill, so water got on the lens/sensor. I'm hoping it's the lens.

title: Oneplus 8t...
text: I forgot again... I've been distracted by writing (aiming for 50k words in November) and placing Arc Raiders...

title: FujiFilm X-T20 + Fujinan CCTV GDS-35/1.7
text: This lens flares so easily, especially with the macro extenders. At least I hope it's flaring.

title: Canon Powershot G10
text: It was a lovely day for a walk.
